alert.note: Alert for Northeast Suffolk; Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 3:43AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Suffolk County through 430 AM EDT... At 343 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mastic Beach, or near Center Moriches, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manorville, Center Moriches, Mastic, Mastic Beach, Calverton, Brookhaven National Laboratory, East Moriches and Remsenburg-Speonk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
